title: New York mayor pleads not guilty to fraud and bribery charges
content: New York mayor Eric Adams has pleaded not guilty to charges of fraud and bribery in a Manhattan federal court. Prosecutors allege he accepted illegal gifts from Turkish associates for political favors. If convicted, Adams could face up to 45 years in prison. The next hearing is scheduled for Wednesday.
summary: New York mayor Eric Adams has pleaded not guilty to charges of fraud and bribery in a Manhattan federal court. Prosecutors allege he accepted illegal gifts from Turkish associates for political favors. If convicted, Adams could face up to 45 years in prison. The next hearing is scheduled for Wednesday.

title: '5,000-pound bunker busters': Iran condemns US 'complicity' in Israeli strikes; top developments
content: Iran condemned the US for supporting Israeli airstrikes on Gaza and Lebanon, accusing Israel of using American-supplied bombs. Hezbollah leader Hassan Nasrallah was reportedly targeted but is believed to be safe. The US denied prior knowledge of the strikes, while President Biden directed adjustments to US forces in the Middle East.
summary: Iran condemned the US for supporting Israeli airstrikes on Gaza and Lebanon, accusing Israel of using American-supplied bombs. Hezbollah leader Hassan Nasrallah was reportedly targeted but is believed to be safe. The US denied prior knowledge of the strikes, while President Biden directed adjustments to US forces in the Middle East.

title: Who is Sheikh Hassan Nasrallah? Hezbollah leader who was target of Israeli strikes
content: Israeli airstrikes targeted Hezbollah leader Hassan Nasrallah in Beirut, resulting in numerous deaths and injuries. Despite the attack, Nasrallah is confirmed to be alive. This marks a significant escalation in the ongoing conflict between Israel and Hezbollah, with substantial impacts on both sides of the confrontation.
summary: Israeli airstrikes targeted Hezbollah leader Hassan Nasrallah in Beirut, resulting in numerous deaths and injuries. Despite the attack, Nasrallah is confirmed to be alive. This marks a significant escalation in the ongoing conflict between Israel and Hezbollah, with substantial impacts on both sides of the confrontation.

title: Ready to back Bangladesh reforms: UN
Communication with Hezbollah's senior leader cut off after Israeli airstrike in Beirut
content: Israeli airstrikes on Beirut’s southern suburbs have disrupted communication with Hezbollah’s senior leadership. The attacks targeted Hezbollah’s headquarters, causing significant damage and injuries. In retaliation, Hezbollah launched rockets towards northern Israel. This escalation raises concerns about the group’s operational capabilities and strategic direction in the ongoing conflict.
summary: Israeli airstrikes on Beirut’s southern suburbs have disrupted communication with Hezbollah’s senior leadership. The attacks targeted Hezbollah’s headquarters, causing significant damage and injuries. In retaliation, Hezbollah launched rockets towards northern Israel. This escalation raises concerns about the group’s operational capabilities and strategic direction in the ongoing conflict.

title: Hezbollah launches 'rocket salvos' at Israel following IDF airstrikes on Beirut
content: The Israeli military and Hezbollah engaged in strikes on Friday. Hezbollah targeted Safed in northern Israel with rockets, causing property damage but no injuries. This was a response to an earlier Israeli airstrike on Hezbollah’s southern Beirut headquarters, which resulted in casualties and destruction. The conflict has led to a humanitarian crisis with many displaced.
summary: The Israeli military and Hezbollah engaged in strikes on Friday. Hezbollah targeted Safed in northern Israel with rockets, causing property damage but no injuries. This was a response to an earlier Israeli airstrike on Hezbollah’s southern Beirut headquarters, which resulted in casualties and destruction. The conflict has led to a humanitarian crisis with many displaced.

title: 'Gen Z Is reviving the values of 1971': Muhammad Yunus praises Bangladesh youth at UNGA
content: Muhammad Yunus, chief advisor to Bangladesh's interim government, praised the youth-led protests that led to Sheikh Hasina’s removal. Speaking at the UN General Assembly, he highlighted Generation Z's role in reviving values from Bangladesh’s 1971 independence and expressed hope for a prosperous future under new leadership.
summary: Muhammad Yunus, chief advisor to Bangladesh's interim government, praised the youth-led protests that led to Sheikh Hasina’s removal. Speaking at the UN General Assembly, he highlighted Generation Z's role in reviving values from Bangladesh’s 1971 independence and expressed hope for a prosperous future under new leadership.

title: P Diddy: TikToker says Feds mistook liquid Ecstasy for 1,000 bottles of baby oil
content: ​"If baby oil was a big part of these parties & all the things that Diddy did to his victims, some celebrity would have made a joke about it here & there. We'd have heard about it," the TikToker said on the most sensational piece of information that came out after Diddy's arrest that 1,000 bottles of baby oil were found from Diddy's mansion.

We'd have heard about it," the TikToker said on the most sensational piece of information that came out after Diddy's arrest that 1,000 bottles of baby oil were found from Diddy's mansion.

title: Doug Emhoff slams Trump's remarks as 'vile antisemitic things'
content: Doug Emhoff criticised former President Donald Trump's comments as antisemitic and dangerous for Jewish Americans. At a Jewish event in Washington, Trump warned that Israel's existence would be threatened if Vice President Kamala Harris won the upcoming election. Emhoff urged Americans to combat antisemitism and hate.
summary: Doug Emhoff criticised former President Donald Trump's comments as antisemitic and dangerous for Jewish Americans. At a Jewish event in Washington, Trump warned that Israel's existence would be threatened if Vice President Kamala Harris won the upcoming election. Emhoff urged Americans to combat antisemitism and hate.

title: 'Obsessed' Donald Trump dials Kennedy Jr to know about sexting scandal: 'My condolences to...'
content: Donald Trump displayed significant interest in the sexting scandal involving his new ally RFK Jr and reporter Olivia Nuzzi, even considering a public statement. ​"My condolences to Ryan Lizza..." was the message that Trump was going to post on Truth Social but better senses prevailed or he was advised to curb his enthusiasm, the report said. ​Ryan Lizza was Olivia Nuzzi's ex-partner who came to news because he also issued a statement that he would not cover Kennedy Jr because of his connection to the issue through his former fiancee Olivia Nuzzi.
summary: Donald Trump displayed significant interest in the sexting scandal involving his new ally RFK Jr and reporter Olivia Nuzzi, even considering a public statement. ​"My condolences to Ryan Lizza..." was the message that Trump was going to post on Truth Social but better senses prevailed or he was advised to curb his enthusiasm, the report said. ​Ryan Lizza was Olivia Nuzzi's ex-partner who came to news because he also issued a statement that he would not cover Kennedy Jr because of his connection to the issue through his former fiancee Olivia Nuzzi.

title: Sexual violence becomes a weapon of war in Sudan's ongoing conflict
content: The Sudanese army has launched an offensive in Khartoum to reclaim territory from the Rapid Support Forces amid a 17-month civil war. Civilians, especially women, face hardships and risk their lives for food. The UN condemns the systematic use of sexual violence as a weapon of war.
summary: The Sudanese army has launched an offensive in Khartoum to reclaim territory from the Rapid Support Forces amid a 17-month civil war. Civilians, especially women, face hardships and risk their lives for food. The UN condemns the systematic use of sexual violence as a weapon of war.

title: Pakistan requests IMF to provide additional $1.5 billion loan to combat climate change
Donald Trump says 'I don't know the situation' on Mark Robinson's porn site scandal
content: Donald Trump earlier endorsed Mark Robinson and called him Martin Luther King on steroids. Since North Carolina is a pivotal swing state, speculation were rife whether Mark Robinson will be asked to quit the race. Robinson was visibly absent from Trump's campaign after the scandal broke out. ​​The Republican guv candidate for North Carolina Mark Robinson apparently made a series of salacious posts to a porn site including describing himself as a Black Nazi etc. years ago. But as the controversy erupted, he denied the allegations and those comments from that site in question were also deleted.
summary: Donald Trump earlier endorsed Mark Robinson and called him Martin Luther King on steroids. Since North Carolina is a pivotal swing state, speculation were rife whether Mark Robinson will be asked to quit the race. Robinson was visibly absent from Trump's campaign after the scandal broke out.  ​​The Republican guv candidate for North Carolina Mark Robinson apparently made a series of salacious posts to a porn site including describing himself as a Black Nazi etc. years ago. But as the controversy erupted, he denied the allegations and those comments from that site in question were also deleted.

title: Kamala Harris' husband wants a strong Republican Party, Scaramucci calls him the 'best kind of alpha male'
content: The Trump campaign dismissed Doug's comment on the Republican party and said he is as irrelevant as a wet paper bag. Trump spokesperson Steven Cheung told Newsweek, "Nobody cares what Doug has to say. He's as irrelevant as a wet paper bag." Doug Emhoff in a podcast commented on the Republican Party and said US needs a stronger Republican Party.
summary: The Trump campaign dismissed Doug's comment on the Republican party and said he is as irrelevant as a wet paper bag. Trump spokesperson Steven Cheung told Newsweek, "Nobody cares what Doug has to say. He's as irrelevant as a wet paper bag." Doug Emhoff in a podcast commented on the Republican Party and said US needs a stronger Republican Party.

title: 'The worst is...': 'Living Nostradamus' warns of a potential US-China conflict
content: Brazilian psychic Athos Salomé warns of potential conflicts involving the US, China, Israel, and Iran. He highlights tensions in the South China Sea and the threat of cyberattacks as triggers for a US-China conflict. Salomé also predicts an Israel-Iran clash in 2024 linked to AI and EMP weapons. Chinese analyst Zheng Yongnian echoes concerns about rising Asian tensions.
summary: Brazilian psychic Athos Salomé warns of potential conflicts involving the US, China, Israel, and Iran. He highlights tensions in the South China Sea and the threat of cyberattacks as triggers for a US-China conflict. Salomé also predicts an Israel-Iran clash in 2024 linked to AI and EMP weapons. Chinese analyst Zheng Yongnian echoes concerns about rising Asian tensions.

title: Eco-activists throw soup on Van Gogh works in UK, hours after two jailed for same
content: Eco-activists threw soup on Vincent van Gogh artworks in the UK, just hours after a British judge sentenced two climate activists for a similar act in 2022. Phoebe Plummer and Anna Holland were convicted for throwing soup at Van Gogh's "Sunflowers" painting. They received prison sentences of two years and 20 months respectively.
summary: Eco-activists threw soup on Vincent van Gogh artworks in the UK, just hours after a British judge sentenced two climate activists for a similar act in 2022. Phoebe Plummer and Anna Holland were convicted for throwing soup at Van Gogh's "Sunflowers" painting. They received prison sentences of two years and 20 months respectively.

title: Georgia governor says at least 11 people are dead in his state after Hurricane Helene
content: Hurricane Helene struck Florida's Big Bend area as a Category 4 storm with winds of 140 mph, causing severe flooding and power outages. Emergency crews are working to rescue trapped residents. The storm has resulted in multiple fatalities and extensive damage across several states, including North Carolina.
summary: Hurricane Helene struck Florida's Big Bend area as a Category 4 storm with winds of 140 mph, causing severe flooding and power outages. Emergency crews are working to rescue trapped residents. The storm has resulted in multiple fatalities and extensive damage across several states, including North Carolina.

title: Nate Silver's latest poll forecast: 'You'd probably rather have Harris' hand to play'
content: In Nate Silver's recent election forecast update, Kamala Harris leads Donald Trump by three percentage points in national polls. His model suggests Harris has an advantage in key states like Pennsylvania, Michigan, and Wisconsin. Interestingly, Silver mentioned he would vote for Trump if Harris proposed banning poker, underscoring how personal interests can influence voting choices.
summary: In Nate Silver's recent election forecast update, Kamala Harris leads Donald Trump by three percentage points in national polls. His model suggests Harris has an advantage in key states like Pennsylvania, Michigan, and Wisconsin. Interestingly, Silver mentioned he would vote for Trump if Harris proposed banning poker, underscoring how personal interests can influence voting choices.

title: 'She should be prosecuted': Trump on Nancy Pelosi and husband’s $500K visa stock trades
content: Donald Trump has called for Nancy Pelosi's prosecution, alleging her husband's stock trades ahead of a DOJ lawsuit against Visa raise ethical concerns. He accused Pelosi of having inside knowledge and tipping off her husband before he sold shares in Visa. A representative for Pelosi denied any wrongdoing.
summary: Donald Trump has called for Nancy Pelosi's prosecution, alleging her husband's stock trades ahead of a DOJ lawsuit against Visa raise ethical concerns. He accused Pelosi of having inside knowledge and tipping off her husband before he sold shares in Visa. A representative for Pelosi denied any wrongdoing.

title: 'Kimberly Guilfoyle floating anti-Kamala story for 25 years. The truth is...'
content: ​"So what if Kamala voiced her fierce opposition all those years ago? If the story is true -- if Kamala did discourage Terence Hallinan from hiring Kimberly–maybe Kamala was just prescient. Maybe Kamala could see back then what it took me 20 years to learn. Kimberly doesn’t believe in anything but Kimberly," Jami wrote explaining that this job-snub story comes back again and again whenever Kimberly needs limelight and relevance.
summary: ​"So what if Kamala voiced her fierce opposition all those years ago? If the story is true -- if Kamala did discourage Terence Hallinan from hiring Kimberly–maybe Kamala was just prescient. Maybe Kamala could see back then what it took me 20 years to learn. Kimberly doesn’t believe in anything but Kimberly," Jami wrote explaining that this job-snub story comes back again and again whenever Kimberly needs limelight and relevance.
